actions.committee: Senate Committee on Labor and Public Welfare
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Labor and Public Welfare.

official_title: A bill to permit foster grandparents in established programs to serve adults where the need for service to children has been met.

summary.text: Provides that the Director of ACTION agency shall allow individuals serving in established foster grandparents programs assisted by the Domestic Volunteer Service Act to serve adults in all cases in which the needs of children previously served by such programs have been met.

titles.title: A bill to permit foster grandparents in established programs to serve adults where the need for service to children has been met.
